ComicInfo.Title: The Gathering, Part 2 of 5: "Happy Birthday"
ComicInfo.Summary: The Gathering, Part 2 of 5: "Happy Birthday": Carol Stevens takes her son Jacob to a comic book store for his birthday. Sysyphyx approaches Jacob there and gives him a box. She says it will give him super powers, including the ability to fly. When Jacob gets home and opens it he begins to act very aggressively. Eventually, his dad is called home when Jacob is found on the roof saying he can fly. When his dad yells at him, Jacob hits him in the head with a bat. His mother finds the father on the floor with a giant cocoon above his bed. Sysyphyx shows up and uses Carol's body to help birth Gnruk, who flies off carrying Sysyphyx.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-10 20:59:10. [CVDB126887] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 05:52:00. [Issue ID 386427]
ComicInfo.Characters: Gnruk of Vol'Kunast,Sysyphyx,Carol Stevens (death),Mr. Arkham [Nyarlathotep (the Crawling Chaos)],Daniel Stevens (death),Mrs. Cather,Jacob Stevens (death)
